channel.title: I need some help portforwarding
channel.description: ok ive got everything on my server going great except for the fact im the only one who can connect ive been searching around for guides but cant find any i have a WGR614v6 router and ive been to [url=http://portforward.com]portforward.com[/url] found the guide for it but i dont know what game type it is. if anyone could help me allow people to connect it would be great! thanks

item.title: I need some help portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @Elvemage_0o Elvemage 0o
item.description:
@Elvemage_0o wrote:

yes there is applications u have to search everywere from basic settings to everything…
if ts not on there then u dont have a router

and u have a router so its on there

ur internet would nto urn without apps.

so u have them just look for them

Read full topic

item.title: I need some help portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @_nickscape ~nickscape~
item.description:
@_nickscape wrote:

[quote=“Elvemage 0o, post:2, topic:236697”]easy log into ur oruter 192.168.1.1

username admin password is password

then go to applications

create new app

type in RSPS for new app name

port start :43594
port end: 43594

port mapping 43594

save changes

go back an enable RSPS

then log out og yoru router and sign on your server with 0.0.0.0 not u no-ip

ur no-ip is used for other players not u :))))

hope this hyelped al ittle[/quote]

sadly theres not applactions
ill post some screen shots[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 14, 2008, 04:21:36 pm[/size][hr]

just click to enlarge[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 14, 2008, 04:25:31 pm[/size][hr]ive also tryed utorrent for my server it works but noone can connect[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 14, 2008, 06:29:11 pm[/size][hr]anyone please[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 14, 2008, 09:14:30 pm[/size][hr]some one please help

Read full topic

item.title: I need some help portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @Elvemage_0o Elvemage 0o
item.description:
@Elvemage_0o wrote:

easy log into ur oruter 192.168.1.1

username admin password is password

then go to applications

create new app

type in RSPS for new app name

port start :43594
port end: 43594

port mapping 43594

save changes

go back an enable RSPS

then log out og yoru router and sign on your server with 0.0.0.0 not u no-ip

ur no-ip is used for other players not u :))))

hope this hyelped al ittle

Read full topic
